lines.text:
[studying Chapman's criminal file]
Facing 14 years further imprisonment. That interests me. For what we have in mind, I think he has possibilities.
And for what *I* have in mind, *you* have possibilities...
Yes, "that again"... and tell him that I *don't* like to be kept *waiting*!
the more scared you are, *talk louder*! You'll get away with *murder*!
Now go and tell the commandant I want to see him!
I'm a realist. I'm in prison and I want to get out! I don't give a damn for Germany, or for England either. Why should I? What have they done for me lately?
Never let the Poles take you prisoner!
